entry.title: IsStandard
entry.summary: Someone is seeking clarification on what transactions are currently considered standard and non-standard, without having to read the core code. They specifically ask whether modifications to multisig 2 out of 3 are standard, providing an example of the scriptSig and scriptPubKey. They also inquire whether Lightning Network transactions are considered standard. However, it remains unclear where they can find detailed information about this topic that is both clear and updated.
